features: ⚠ For convenience and durability, we upgraded and lengthened the straps to fit more chairs instead of adding extra extension straps.

[UPGRADE & UNIQUE BACK SUPPORT PILLOW]- If you spend a lot of time sitting on office chair, gaming chair and driving in car, this lumbar pillow will perfectly help you. The back support for car is designed ergonomically to relieve upper, mid and lower back pain and back tightness,supports you in achieving right posture and helps maintain a gentle curve in the spine.

[NEVER FLATTENS OUT] - Qutool lumbar support pillow for car adopts High density, thick, durable fabulous and precisely molded memory foam which insures a firm comfy fit and enhance your comfort while retaining its density. The chair pillow can provide enough supportive and comfortable than lumbar roll. Ideal for drivers, teachers, students,office workers etc.

[HOLD in PLACE] - Unlike other low quality office chair pillows on the market, the new Qutool lumbar pillow has two adjustable, upgraded straps, so no matter how you move, the back cushion will stay firmly attached to any office chair, computer chair, car seat, SUV, truck or other home office accessories. Lumbar support pillow size: 17”(longest) x 15.5”(widest) x 4.7”(thickest)

[BREATHABLE 3D MESH COVER]- With removable and machine washable mesh cover, this wheelchair back cushion can keep air circulation well and always keep you back cool and comfortable, dry for the best experience, so sweat and moisture doesn’t fill it up, suitable for all seasons.

[PERFECT GIFT FOR FESTIVAL]- Perfect for christmas,New years, birthdays, valentine's day, mother's day, father's day, weddings, hallows' day and graduations.Try it now, don't worry. Please let us know if our lumbar pillow does not work for you for any reason.

⚠ Qutool Lumbar Support Pillow comes with a Replacement Policy. Ask for a refund or replacement if you have any quality related issues (covers, zippers, straps, etc.) or other questions, please contact us via Amazon.
body.description: Memory Foam Lumbar Support Pillow Ergonomic Designed for Back Pain Relief and Correct Posture Why do you need a lumbar support pillow? If you suffer from poor posture with an accentuated curve and chronic back pain, QUTOOL lumbar cushion is definitely recommended, especially if your routine involves extensive periods of sitting. QUTOOL Back Cushion helps provide support to maintain the muscles and help maintain proper posture, a lumbar cushion lowers the stress build-up. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a quick, cheap addition to under supported office chair!
reviews.reviewText: Works well, comfortable and adds support to a mesh back chair that lacked any previously. Arrived on time and as described. High quality memory foam. Strap is well made and easy to add to your chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my third different Lumbar support pillow.As a truck driver I tweaked my back about 5 years ago and got a slightly herniated disk that never quite went away. The pain is hardly noticeable except if I sleep a certain way. But it will not go away probably because as a driver I'm always bouncing around in the truck.So I thought I would try out lumber pillows. My first one was a basic cylindar type pillow that worked fine. I noticed less pain at night in certain positions. But when I got a new truck the seat was not a good fit for that cylinder pillow so I got a small wedge type pillow. That pillow hurt my kidneys as it was not tapered enough at the tapered end.So I decided to try this one. Perfect!! I had zero problems with it. I actually forgot it was there it was so comfortable. Maybe finally my back will totally heal. I will update this in a couple of months or so.Update: 12/30/23Just after a few weeks my back discomfort is gone. I can now sleep in that one position that I haven't slept in years, without waking up in pain. That slight hernia I had for years is finally healing fully simply because this product gives your lower back the correct alignment it needs while sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Posture Improvement in Any Chair
reviews.reviewText: Ergonomic Design (4/5):The pillow's ergonomic design provides excellent support to the lower back, helping to alleviate discomfort and maintain proper spinal alignment.Versatile Use (4/5):This lumbar support pillow can be used in office chairs, cars, computer chairs, gaming chairs, and even recliners, making it a versatile solution for various seating needs.Memory Foam (4/5):The use of memory foam ensures a comfortable and customized fit as the pillow molds to the shape of your back.Breathable Cover (4/5):The cover is made from breathable mesh fabric, which helps prevent overheating during prolonged use.Adjustable Straps (4/5):The adjustable straps make it easy to secure the pillow to your chair and keep it in place.Posture Improvement (4/5):Using this lumbar support pillow can encourage better posture, reducing the risk of discomfort and pain associated with poor sitting habits.Compact and Portable (4/5):The pillow's compact size allows for easy portability, so you can take it with you wherever you need extra support.Value for Money (4/5):Considering the comfort and posture benefits it offers, this lumbar support pillow provides good value for its price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfect on my couch
reviews.reviewText: At first I was worried because of the straps , but they don't get in the way at all. I have a compression fracture and to make my couch mark comfortable. I use this pillow to lean against in combination with a rectangular orthopedic dog bed mat to sit on (because I already had it and it does the job just fine). I would rate this pillow a 10/10 it GREATLY reduces my back pain while sitting on my couch. Yes you can use it without using the straps and it is a good size easy to position and doesn't move around once I lean against it. I am very glad I bought this as I was quickly furnishing my apartment and bought a cheap couch. This makes up for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Depends On You
reviews.reviewText: This product has proper support, excellent installation methods that hold it's position rather well and rather good comfort in my opinion. However, this product is definitely not meant for everyone.Simply put, the lumbar support is very apparent but it's also rather intense. I personally wish they had a model of this with maybe half the support. That said, it's also probably due to the design of my chair. I have a standard, flat back office chair so any alterations to it's seating design are very apparent. I imagine this would be great with more cushioned or curved style seat backing.Otherwise, it's comfortable and doesn't make my back feel like it's been resting against solid plastic or wood anymore. I'd say it's at least worth trying out for the quality and design that's gone into this alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great conform for my lower back and durable.
reviews.reviewText: I drive long distances and this has helped my lower back a lot. Very comfortable and durable. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent support, very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Excellent value; well manufactured and fairly priced. Very easy to install on your chair. Provides excellent support to my lower back. I'll buy it again for my home office chair and won't hesitate recommending it to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3 years later still really comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I have owned this for 3 years in my home office. It is comfortable and offers great support. That said I only found it comfortable after I flipped it upside down so the thicker side was at the top. This worked better with the existing lumbar support of my chair while giving support to my shoulders. I will definitely be ordering another one for my desk at work. I wish it came in different colors though. Black is serviceable but boring.

reviews.reviewerName: A função é boa mas não tem como limpar os resíduos que entram pelo canudo plástico e vai para mola de plastico ,e se remover para limpar, a mola não entra de volta

reviews.reviewText: The design is excellent for the back support I need. The two straps secure the cushion to straight-back chairs to provide needed support at the kitchen table, etc. It's well-made of very comfortable memory foam and while it is sturdy, it's light in weight. Great purchase and next-day delivery with Prime.
El soporte que da en la espalda es el mejor entre varios productos similares que probé.

I was slightly skeptical when I purchased this. After all, it was a little on the pricey side and there are cheaper options out there. Pleasantly surprised to find that it works well. I invert it to support my middle back.
